content.prompt: Based on the map above, a prediction that could be made about the 2016 election in Texas (TX) is that

choices.label: voter turnout increased in the 2016 election
the number of eligible voters decreased in the 2016 election
Democrats won the popular vote for president in 2016
the electoral college vote was split between Democrats and Republicans

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain how the visual elements of the source (a cartoon, map, or infographic) illustrate or relate to political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
